casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Colston, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Colston, 111 Ohio St.3d 266, 2006-Ohio-5703.]

(No. 2006-0272 Submitted September 20, 2006 Decided November 15, 2006.) Law Firm of Curt C. Hartman and Curt C. Hartman, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The certified question is answered in the affirmative and the judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Buehner, 110 Ohio St.3d 403, 2006-Ohio-4707, 853 N.E.2d 1162.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell and Lanzinger, JJ., concur. Pfeifer, J.,

dissents for the reasons he dissented in State v. Buehner, 110 Ohio St.3d 403, 2006-Ohio-4707, 853 N.E.2d 1162.
